Steps.Message: Update at 16:17 - We know the timeframe we initially estimated is now approaching. Our engineers are continuing their work to our overhead network in the CB8 8 & CO10 8 area. As our staff are working with live electricity, we need to wait until it is safe for them to stop and contact us with an update. We're sorry you've been impacted by this today and we'll provide you an update as soon as possible.

We became aware of this power cut at 14:05. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut, but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly. Engineers in our control room have switched some customers power back on in your area. To get everyone’s power back on we may need to attend to investigate and make repairs. We’ll continue to update you until everyone’s power is back on.
Steps.Name: We are restoring customers automatically

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Logs.Comment: Update at 16:17 - We know the timeframe we initially estimated is now approaching. Our engineers are continuing their work to our overhead network in the CB8 8 & CO10 8 area. As our staff are working with live electricity, we need to wait until it is safe for them to stop and contact us with an update. We're sorry you've been impacted by this today and we'll provide you an update as soon as possible.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: We were investigating a high voltage overhead electricity line fault which caused a power cut in the local area.
